parameters.content:
# ğŸ“Š ĞœĞĞĞ˜Ğ¢ĞĞ Ğ˜ĞĞ“ WEBCHAT



## âš™ï¸ ĞĞĞ¡Ğ¢Ğ ĞĞ™ĞšĞ



### 1ï¸âƒ£ ĞĞ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ÑƒĞ·Ğ»Ñ‹ Â«âš™ï¸ CONFIGÂ»

ĞšĞ°Ğ¶Ğ´Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ†ĞµÑÑ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ CONFIG ÑƒĞ·ĞµĞ».
ĞÑ‚ĞºÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ñ€Ñ‹:



**ğŸ”‘ ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ:**

â€¢ `api_key` â€” Ğ’Ğ°Ñˆ API ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡

â€¢ `rate_limit_max` â€” Ğ›Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ²/Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½



**ğŸ—„ï¸ Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹ Ğ±Ğ°Ğ·Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ…:**

â€¢ `table_monitoring` â€” Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°

â€¢ `table_chat_ru` â€” RU Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸

â€¢ `table_chat_en` â€” EN Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸

â€¢ `table_contacts` â€” ĞšĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ñ‹



**â±ï¸ Ğ’Ñ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ñ€Ñ‹:**

â€¢ `active_interval_minutes` â€” Ğ˜Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ°Ğ» Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸

â€¢ `data_retention_days` â€” Ğ¥Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ…



---



### 2ï¸âƒ£ ĞŸĞ¾Ğ´ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Credentials



**PostgreSQL** â†’ Ğ²ÑĞµ ÑƒĞ·Ğ»Ñ‹ Ñ Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ğŸ˜



---



### 3ï¸âƒ£ API Endpoints



| ĞœĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ | Endpoint | ĞĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ |
|:-----:|----------|----------|
| POST | `/chat-monitoring` | Ğ¡Ğ¾Ñ…Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ |
| GET | `/chat-monitoring-data` | Ğ”Ğ°ÑˆĞ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´ |
| GET | `/chat-dialogs` | Ğ”Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ |
| GET | `/server-time` | Ğ’Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ |
| GET | `/real-message-count` | Ğ¡Ñ‡Ñ‘Ñ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğº |
| GET | `/get-contact-data` | ĞšĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ñ‹ |



---



### 4ï¸âƒ£ ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ²



ĞŸĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ API ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ· ÑĞ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ²:

â€¢ Header: `x-api-key: Ğ’ĞĞ¨_ĞšĞ›Ğ®Ğ§`

â€¢ Query: `?apiKey=Ğ’ĞĞ¨_ĞšĞ›Ğ®Ğ§`

â€¢ Body: `{"apiKey": "Ğ’ĞĞ¨_ĞšĞ›Ğ®Ğ§"}`



---



### 5ï¸âƒ£ ĞĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ



ĞĞ°Ğ¶Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ **Active** â†—ï¸ Ğ² Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ñ…Ğ½ĞµĞ¼ ÑƒĞ³Ğ»Ñƒ

parameters.query:
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ“Š Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ°: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

INSERT INTO {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }} (
    record_id, record_timestamp, session_id, user_id, user_name,
    config_name, platform, timestamp, session_start_time, 
    last_activity_time, session_duration, event_type, message_count,
    current_language, is_minimized, user_agent, screen_resolution,
    language, timezone, referrer, current_url, domain,
    geo_ip, geo_country, geo_city, geo_region, geo_latitude, geo_longitude
)
VALUES (
    '{{ $json.recordId }}',
    '{{ $json.recordTimestamp }}',
    '{{ $json.session_id }}',
    '{{ $json.user_id }}',
    '{{ $json.user_name }}',
    '{{ $json.config_name }}',
    '{{ $json.platform }}',
    '{{ $json.timestamp }}',
    '{{ $json.session_start_time }}',
    '{{ $json.last_activity_time }}',
    {{ $json.session_duration }},
    '{{ $json.event_type }}',
    {{ $json.message_count }},
    '{{ $json.current_language }}',
    {{ $json.is_minimized }},
    '{{ $json.user_agent }}',
    '{{ $json.screen_resolution }}',
    '{{ $json.language }}',
    '{{ $json.timezone }}',
    '{{ $json.referrer }}',
    '{{ $json.current_url }}',
    '{{ $json.domain }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_ip }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_country }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_city }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_region }}',
    {{ $json.geo_latitude || 'NULL' }},
    {{ $json.geo_longitude || 'NULL' }}
)
ON CONFLICT (session_id) 
DO UPDATE SET
    config_name = EXCLUDED.config_name,
    platform = EXCLUDED.platform,
    last_activity_time = EXCLUDED.last_activity_time,
    session_duration = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (EXCLUDED.last_activity_time::timestamp - {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.session_start_time::timestamp))::integer,
    message_count = {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.message_count,
    current_language = EXCLUDED.current_language,
    is_minimized = EXCLUDED.is_minimized,
    geo_ip = EXCLUDED.geo_ip,
    geo_country = EXCLUDED.geo_country,
    geo_city = EXCLUDED.geo_city,
    geo_region = EXCLUDED.geo_region,
    geo_latitude = EXCLUDED.geo_latitude,
    geo_longitude = EXCLUDED.geo_longitude,
    event_type = EXCLUDED.event_type,
    user_id = CASE 
        WHEN {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_id IS NULL OR {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_id = '' 
        THEN EXCLUDED.user_id 
        ELSE {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_id 
    END,
    user_name = CASE 
        WHEN {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_name IS NULL OR {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_name = '' 
        THEN EXCLUDED.user_name 
        ELSE {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_name 
    END
RETURNING *;

-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ“Š ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ° Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´Ğ°ÑˆĞ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°
-- Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.table_monitoring }},
--          {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.table_chat_ru }},
--          {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.table_chat_en }}
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

WITH real_message_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        session_id,
        COUNT(*) as real_count,
        array_agg(created_at ORDER BY created_at) as message_timestamps
    FROM (
        SELECT session_id, created_at FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.table_chat_ru }}
        UNION ALL
        SELECT session_id, created_at FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.table_chat_en }}
    ) all_messages
    GROUP BY session_id
),
session_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        wm.session_id,
        MIN(wm.session_start_time) as session_start,
        MAX(wm.last_activity_time) as last_activity,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(wm.last_activity_time) - MIN(wm.session_start_time)))::integer as duration,
        COALESCE(rmc.real_count, 0) as messages,
        COALESCE(rmc.message_timestamps, ARRAY[]::timestamp[]) as message_timestamps,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.user_id) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as user_id,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.user_name) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as user_name,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.config_name) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as config_name,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.current_language) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as language,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.geo_ip) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as ip,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.geo_country) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as country,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.geo_city) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as city,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.user_agent) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as user_agent,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.referrer) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as referrer,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.domain) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as domain,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.platform) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as platform
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.table_monitoring }} wm
    LEFT JOIN real_message_counts rmc ON wm.session_id = rmc.session_id
    WHERE wm.last_activity_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '{{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.data_retention_days }} days'
        AND wm.user_id IS NOT NULL 
        AND wm.user_id != ''
        AND wm.user_id != 'undefined'
    GROUP BY wm.session_id, wm.timestamp, wm.user_id, wm.user_name, wm.config_name, 
             wm.current_language, wm.geo_ip, wm.geo_country, wm.geo_city, wm.user_agent, 
             wm.referrer, wm.domain, wm.platform, rmc.real_count, rmc.message_timestamps
)
SELECT DISTINCT ON (session_id) 
    *,
    CASE 
        WHEN last_activity > NOW() - INTERVAL '{{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 2').item.json.active_interval_minutes }} minutes' THEN 'active'
        ELSE 'inactive'
    END as status
FROM session_stats
ORDER BY session_id, last_activity DESC;

-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ’¬ ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¾ session_id
-- Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 3').item.json.table_chat_ru }},
--          {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 3').item.json.table_chat_en }}
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

WITH all_chats AS (
    -- Ğ ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸
    SELECT 
        id,
        session_id,
        message::json->>'type' as message_type,
        message::json->>'content' as content,
        created_at as timestamp,
        platform,
        'ru' as language
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 3').item.json.table_chat_ru }}
    WHERE session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}'

    UNION ALL

    -- ĞĞ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸
    SELECT 
        id,
        session_id,
        message::json->>'type' as message_type,
        message::json->>'content' as content,
        created_at as timestamp,
        platform,
        'en' as language
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 3').item.json.table_chat_en }}
    WHERE session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}'
)
SELECT * FROM all_chats
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ‘¤ ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ…
-- Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 5').item.json.table_contacts }},
--          {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 5').item.json.table_monitoring }}
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

SELECT 
    ucd.session_id,
    ucd.full_name,
    ucd.first_name,
    ucd.last_name,
    ucd.phone,
    ucd.phone_raw,
    ucd.email,
    ucd.telegram,
    ucd.whatsapp,
    ucd.instagram,
    ucd.other_contacts,
    ucd.company,
    ucd.position,
    ucd.location,
    ucd.preferred_contact,
    ucd.confidence_score,
    ucd.extracted_from,
    ucd.last_updated
FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 5').item.json.table_contacts }} ucd
WHERE ucd.session_id IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT session_id 
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 5').item.json.table_monitoring }} 
    WHERE last_activity_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '{{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 5').item.json.data_retention_days }} days'
);

-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
-- ğŸ”¢ ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ€ĞµĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ¾Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹
-- Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 6').item.json.table_monitoring }},
--          {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 6').item.json.table_chat_ru }},
--          {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 6').item.json.table_chat_en }}
-- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

WITH message_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        session_id,
        COUNT(*) as real_messages
    FROM (
        SELECT session_id FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 6').item.json.table_chat_ru }}
        UNION ALL
        SELECT session_id FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 6').item.json.table_chat_en }}
    ) all_messages
    GROUP BY session_id
)
SELECT 
    wm.session_id,
    COALESCE(mc.real_messages, 0) as message_count
FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 6').item.json.table_monitoring }} wm
LEFT JOIN message_counts mc ON wm.session_id = mc.session_id
WHERE wm.session_id IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT session_id 
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG 6').item.json.table_monitoring }} 
    WHERE last_activity_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
);
